description:
Learn 100 greek roots to improve your vocabulary by associating roots with images. 

Play pictionary with robots. Search bots show images. You guess the root.


Game provides the following:
- Three memorization activities: spin, match, and guess.
- Sideways flick to choose different words, phrases, and facts.
- Slow spelling of the answer, letter every 5 seconds.
- Image results from Google, Bing, and Yahoo.
- Clue with meaning or context.
- Cheat sheet with the complete list of answers.
- Full look and feel support for the iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Palm Pre/Pixi, Blackberry OS6

This game aids learning through:
- Addictive action to repeatedly expose target words to the player
- Holistic focus on meaning, association, and spelling concurrently
- Associate real images with each each - including additional word meanings in slang or otherwise
- Speed based to emulate SAT testing environments
- Positive reinforcement with no penalties for mistakes

Join the 1,500,000 plus who have downloaded Keys apps - the #1 edutainment app network.
